job_description:
***This is an unpaid internship at this time and is suitable for candidates pursuing degree completion that wants to be an AI Engineer.***

Flow Turbo is a SaaS AI Sales Platform that is designed to maximize the productivity day-to-day for sales reps.

Company Overview:

Flow is a cutting-edge high-tech enterprise AI company at the forefront of innovation in artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies. With a mission to revolutionize the way B2B sales organizations leverage the power of AI, Flow’s cutting-edge AI platform empowers B2B sales organizations to unlock new levels of efficiency, productivity, and growth. With a focus on advanced complex engineering, AI modeling, AI training, and AI deployment, we're dedicated to delivering unparalleled value to our clients and shaping the future of technology. At Flow, we pride ourselves on our culture of performance, execution, teamwork, leadership, communication, creative freedom, where every team member is empowered to contribute their unique talents and expertise. Join us in shaping the future of AI and making a difference in the world.

Position Overview:

Flow is seeking a highly skilled and motivated AI Engineer Intern to join our AI team. As an AI Engineer Intern, you will be involved in cutting-edge AI responsibilities, including novel AI modeling, AI training, and AI deployment on various cloud computing platforms. This position is ideal for individuals currently pursuing a master's degree in Computer Science with a passion for AI. The internship is remote-only and requires a commitment of at least 20+ hours per week. No training will be provided, and candidates are expected to be experts in their field from the outset.
• *Key Responsibilities:**

1. Develop novel AI models using techniques such as Classification, Regression, Neural Networks (Deep Learning), Support Vector Machines (SVM), Natural Language Processing (NLP), Long Short-Term Memory networks, Large Language Models (LLMs), Chatbots, Unsupervised Learning, and Reinforcement Learning.
2. Implement Unsupervised Learning algorithms for tasks such as clustering, anomaly detection, and dimensionality reduction.
3. Explore and implement Reinforcement Learning algorithms for autonomous decision-making in dynamic environments.
4. Participate in AI training processes, including data collection, preprocessing, feature engineering, and model optimization.
5. Utilize Django, Django Template Language, and Django REST framework for back-end integrations and API development.
6. Integrate AI models into live production systems and deploy them on a wide variety of cloud computing platforms, ensuring functionality, accuracy, scalability, reliability, and performance.
7. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into AI solutions.
8. Stay updated on the latest advancements in AI research and technologies, and apply them to enhance our products and services.
9. Conduct performance evaluation and optimization of AI models to achieve desired accuracy and efficiency levels.
10. Document project specifications, methodologies, and results for internal reference and knowledge sharing.
• *Qualifications:**

- Currently pursuing a master's degree in Computer Science or a related field, with a focus on Artificial Intelligence.
- Expert in Django, Django Template Language, and Django REST framework for web application development.
- Expert in AI modeling with techniques such as Classification, Regression, Neural Networks, SVM, NLP, LLMs, Chatbots, Unsupervised Learning, and Reinforcement Learning.
- Expert in AI training processes, including data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model optimization.
- Expert with AI deployment on cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.
- Expert programming skills in Python, Django, and experience with relevant libraries and frameworks such as TensorFlow, Pandas, Keras, Scikit-learn, Jupyter Notebook, Google Collab.
- Excellent data structures and algorithms technical engineering problem-solving skills and ability to apply AI concepts to real-world problems.
- Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently with minimal supervision.
- Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively in a remote team environment.
• *Note:**

This internship offers an exciting opportunity to gain hands-on experience in cutting-edge AI technologies and real-world AI projects. Candidates must be passionate about AI and demonstrate a strong technical background in machine learning and deep learning. The internship provides valuable exposure to AI development processes, deployment strategies, and cloud computing environments, making it an ideal opportunity for aspiring AI engineers.
• **This is an unpaid internship at this time and is suitable for candidates pursuing degree completion that wants to be an AI Engineer.***
